dialogue.text: Not too bad, but I'm a little worried about the increase of goblins these days.
How can I help you?
No, I have nothing I wish to get rid of. If you want to do some trading, there are plenty of shops and market stalls around though.
I'm sorry I can't help you there.
I've heard there are many fearsome creatures that dwell under the ground...
Get out of my way, I'm in a hurry!
I'm fine, how are you?
Hello there! Nice weather we've been having.
I'm very well thank you.
Who are you?
Ah, a very noble profession.
Do I know you? I'm in a hurry!
I think we need a new king. The one we've got isn't very good.
Not too bad thanks.
Are you asking for a fight?
I'm busy right now.
Hello.
None of your business.
No I don't have any spare change.
I'm a little worried - I've heard there's lots of people going about, killing citizens at random.
No, I don't want to buy anything!
That is classified information.
Have this flier...
Yo, wassup!
I like our king, he's keeping the poor and infected away from us decent folk.
Not too bad. Glad the plague hasn't touched, the better areas of town.
An outsider! Can you get me out of this hell hole?
Go away. People from the outside shut us in like animals. I have nothing to say to you.
Bah, those mourners... they're meant to be helping us, but I think they're doing more harm here than good. They won't even let me send a letter out to my family.
Yes, I've seen her. Very helpful person.
Not for the last few days though... I thought maybe she'd gone home.
Oh I'm not one to cause a fuss.
Have this flyer...
